name: download_video_or_reel
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool facebook_video_and_reel_downloader.
Tool description: Simple and light weight api to extract download links of Facebook video or reel.
API description: You can extract Download links of **Facebook **Video or Reel in **HD **and **SD **formats.

url.description: The URL of the Facebook video or reel to be downloaded.
